addAttributeInfoFor

public void addAttributeInfoFor(java.lang.String name,
                                java.lang.Object value,
                                java.lang.String type,
                                java.lang.String description,
                                boolean readable,
                                boolean writable)
Creates an entry for a new attribute with the properties given as arguments

Parameters:
name - The name of the attribute, used as the entry
value - The intial value given to the attribute
type - The type of the attribute
description - A brief description of the attribute
readable - Read access for the attribute
writable - Write access for the attribute
